title: doc/articles: references obsolete code.google.com/p/codesearch/index
body:
This document:

"About the go command"
https://golang.org/doc/articles/go_command.html

references codesearch as part of code.google.com:

code.google.com/p/codesearch/index

This should be changed to:

github.com/google/codesearch/index

I am happy to make this change and submit a patch.
